sections.title: Acceptance of Terms
sections.content: By downloading, installing, or using the Vanta Society mobile application (the "App"), you agree to be bound by these Terms of Service ("Terms"). If you do not agree to these Terms, do not use the App. We reserve the right to modify these Terms at any time. Your continued use of the App after changes are posted constitutes acceptance of the modified Terms.

sections.title: Eligibility
sections.content: You must be at least 13 years old (or 16 in the European Economic Area) to use this App. By using the App, you represent and warrant that you meet this age requirement. If you are under 18, you must have parental or guardian consent to use the App and make purchases.

sections.title: Account Registration
sections.content: To access certain features of the App, you must create an account using:
items: Apple Sign-In (iOS users)
Google Sign-In (Android users)
Email authentication
sections.additionalContent: You are responsible for maintaining the confidentiality of your account credentials and for all activities that occur under your account. You agree to notify us immediately of any unauthorized use of your account.

subsections.subtitle: Overview
subsections.content: The Winter Arc is a 66-day personal development challenge designed to help you build lasting habits through daily rituals in fitness, mindset, and lifestyle categories.

subsections.subtitle: Arc Pass Purchase
subsections.content: Access to the full Winter Arc experience requires purchasing an Arc Pass, a one-time digital purchase processed through Apple's App Store or Google Play Store. The Arc Pass includes:
items: Personalized daily routine generated by AI
Progress tracking and vitals scoring system
Evening check-in and journaling features
Access to community leaderboards
Eligibility to earn Store Credits upon successful completion

subsections.subtitle: Completion Requirements
subsections.content: To successfully complete the Winter Arc and earn Store Credits, you must:
items: Complete at least 80% of your daily rituals across all 66 days
Maintain consistent engagement throughout the challenge period
Submit evening check-ins as required
Follow the Winter Arc rules and guidelines

subsections.subtitle: Store Credits
subsections.content: Store Credits are digital rewards earned by successfully completing the Winter Arc challenge:
items: **No Cash Value**: Store Credits have no monetary value and cannot be exchanged for cash, withdrawn, or transferred
**Redemption**: Credits can be redeemed for future Arc Pass access, premium merchandise, or curated Vanta rewards available in our Marketplace
**Expiration**: Store Credits do not expire but reward availability may vary over time
**Non-Transferable**: Credits cannot be transferred to other users
**Forfeiture**: Credits may be forfeited if your account is terminated for violation of these Terms
subsections.disclaimer: Vanta Society reserves the right to modify the Store Credits program, redemption options, and reward catalog at any time without prior notice.

subsections.subtitle: In-App Purchases
subsections.content: All purchases are processed through Apple's App Store or Google Play Store and are subject to their respective payment terms and conditions. We use RevenueCat to manage subscriptions and purchases. By making a purchase, you agree to RevenueCat's Terms of Service (available at revenuecat.com/terms).

subsections.subtitle: Pricing
subsections.content: Arc Pass pricing is displayed in your local currency at the time of purchase. Prices may vary by region and are subject to change. We reserve the right to modify pricing at any time, but changes will not affect purchases already completed.

subsections.subtitle: Refund Policy
subsections.content: **All purchases are final.** Refund requests must be submitted directly to Apple or Google according to their standard refund policies:
items: **Apple App Store**: Refunds are handled by Apple. To request a refund, visit reportaproblem.apple.com or contact Apple Support within 14 days of purchase
**Google Play Store**: Refunds are handled by Google. To request a refund, visit the Google Play Store support page

**What Happens After Refund**: If a refund is granted by Apple or Google, your Arc Pass access will be immediately revoked, and you will lose access to all Winter Arc features and any progress made. Store Credits earned (if any) will also be forfeited.
subsections.note: Vanta Society does not process refunds directly. All refund requests must go through the platform (Apple or Google) where the purchase was made.

subsections.subtitle: Restore Purchases
subsections.content: If you delete and reinstall the App, or install it on a new device, you can restore your Arc Pass purchase using the "Restore Purchase" button in the payment screen. Your progress and data can be restored if you enabled backup/sync before uninstalling.

sections.content: As a user of the App, you agree to:
items: Provide accurate and complete information during registration and profile setup
Use the App only for lawful purposes and in accordance with these Terms
Not attempt to hack, reverse engineer, or exploit the App's systems
Not share your account credentials with others
Not use the App to harass, abuse, or harm others
Not upload or share content that is illegal, offensive, or violates others' rights
Not attempt to manipulate progress tracking, vitals scores, or leaderboards
Comply with all applicable local, state, national, and international laws

sections.title: Health and Fitness Disclaimer
warnings: **Not Medical Advice**: The App is designed for general fitness and wellness purposes only. It is NOT a medical device and does NOT provide medical advice, diagnosis, or treatment.

**Consult Healthcare Provider**: Before starting the Winter Arc challenge or making any significant changes to your exercise routine, diet, or lifestyle, consult with a qualified healthcare professional, especially if you:
- Have a history of heart disease, high blood pressure, or respiratory conditions
- Have joint, bone, or muscle injuries

**Individual Results Vary**: The health benefits and statistics shown in the App are based on clinical research studies with large participant groups. Your individual results may differ significantly.
**Assumption of Risk**: By using the App and participating in the Winter Arc challenge, you acknowledge and accept the risks associated with physical exercise and lifestyle changes.
**Listen to Your Body**: Stop any exercise immediately if you experience pain, dizziness, shortness of breath, or discomfort. Seek medical attention if symptoms persist.

**No Liability**: Vanta Society, its founders, employees, and affiliates are not liable for any injuries, damages, or health issues that may result from using the App or following its recommendations.

sections.title: Data Privacy and Security
sections.content: Your use of the App is also governed by our Privacy Policy, which is incorporated into these Terms by reference. By using the App, you consent to the collection, use, and sharing of your information as described in the Privacy Policy. Please review our Privacy Policy at https://vantasociety.com/privacy for details on:
items: What data we collect (personal info, health data, usage data)
How we use your data (routine generation, progress tracking, analytics)
How we protect your data (encryption, secure storage)
Your privacy rights (access, deletion, portability)

subsections.subtitle: Termination by You
subsections.content: You may delete your account at any time using the "Delete Account" button in the App's Profile screen. Upon deletion:
items: Your personal information will be deleted within 30 days
Backup data will be deleted from our servers within 90 days
Your Arc Pass access will be immediately revoked (no refund)
All Store Credits will be forfeited
Your progress and data cannot be recovered

subsections.subtitle: Termination by Us
subsections.content: We reserve the right to suspend or terminate your account at any time, without prior notice, if:
items: You violate these Terms of Service
You engage in fraudulent or illegal activity
You abuse or harass other users or our support team
You attempt to manipulate progress tracking or leaderboards
Your account has been inactive for an extended period
subsections.note: Terminated accounts are not eligible for refunds, and any Store Credits will be forfeited.
